name: cheese game (itch)
description:
WASD to move the camera, E to build and click to remove buildings

the aim of the game is to make almond cheese (and other stuff i guess), almond cheese is pretty simple to make. you put almonds and water in a holder to make watered almonds

 then you put watered almonds into a holder with lemon juice to make a lemon watered almond.

 THEN you gotta put the lemon watered almond in a holder with olive oil

crush that shit up with a crusher to make crushed almonds.

and then put those crushed almonds in a holder with water, AND BOOM you have some almond cheese.

oh yeah you can also make demon mozzarella sticks, but ill let you figure that out :)
